title: Gold 4 Mid/Sup and Gold 4 Jungle Looking for 3 CLASH TEAMMATES!
body:
Hey anyone reading this, myself and another Gold Player are looking for some fellow gold/ possibly silver league players to make up our team of 5 for CLASH!

At the moment we just have the two of us, and are searching for ADC, TOP and SUP or MID players to fill up our team. We are quite serious about winning but overall just looking to have some fun every two weeks on CLASH :) 

IGN: KnotScriping (MID/SUP Player with 61% wr SoloQ on main acc)
IGN: SK1LLZ ( JG Player with 58% wr SoloQ)

If you're interested please add either of us in game! We would prefer Gold players but high silver are an option as well. Please be available for the 3 days of clash competitions every 2nd week if possible (obviously not every tournament is possible we understand other commitments come up). Thanks and hope to see you in game!

replies.body:
Heyo, I have a G4 bot lane, both supp (Ign: Foxilite) and adc (Ign: Wedgie) and my highest rank this season was G4, but have been playing a bit messily recently so not looking too great right now Ign: Leagues Legend

If you still need three than this could work out nicely.

Hey there, 

S1 Support main - I do all those bitch healers like Janna and Nami.
Account:  MrHurn

Hey i have myself and a friend looking for a team
Mid/adc and supporter
IGNs : Order, 3June
Languages : English and Korean
22yrs olds
We'll be online in couple of hours leave us a message :)
